Title: Windows Phone Socket Library
Description: Silverlight socket library for use with Windows Phone 7 Mango.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Silverlight socket library for use with Windows Phone 7 Mango.

This is a simple socket library to help people who want to use the TCP/IP services made available in Mango. In its current state, it is not much more than the code found in the MSDN tutorial. A lot of work has been planned for this, so keep checking back for more versions.

NOTE: UDP support will be in the next update.
